enabled.name: Enable Campaign Assistant
enabled.hint: Master toggle for the Campaign Assistant module

addActorButtons.name: Add Character Sheet Buttons
addActorButtons.hint: Add Session Advancement button to character sheets (requires reload)

trackSessionHistory.name: Track Session History
trackSessionHistory.hint: Save session advancement history in actor flags

useWeaknessRule.name: Use Weakness Optional Rule
useWeaknessRule.hint: Enable the weakness question in session advancement (optional rule from rulebook)

hideParticipated.name: Hide 'Did you participate in the game session?'
hideParticipated.hint: Hide this advancement question from the dialog

hideExplored.name: Hide 'Did you explore a new location?'
hideExplored.hint: Hide this advancement question from the dialog

hideDefeated.name: Hide 'Did you defeat one or more dangerous adversaries?'
hideDefeated.hint: Hide this advancement question from the dialog

hideOvercame.name: Hide 'Did you overcome an obstacle without using force?'
hideOvercame.hint: Hide this advancement question from the dialog

customQuestions.name: Custom Advancement Questions
customQuestions.hint: Add custom advancement questions separated by semicolons. Each 'yes' answer grants 1 mark. Example: Did you roleplay your character well?; Did you help the party succeed?; Did you contribute to the story?

advancementRollMode.name: Advancement Roll Mode
advancementRollMode.hint: Choose how skill advancement rolls are handled in Step 3. Bulk: Roll all skills at once with one summary. Individual: Click each skill to roll them one at a time.

debugMode.name: Debug Mode
debugMode.hint: Enable detailed console logging for troubleshooting

questions.participated: Did you participate in the game session?
questions.explored: Did you explore a new location?
questions.defeated: Did you defeat one or more dangerous adversaries?
questions.overcame: Did you overcome an obstacle without using force?
questions.weaknessQuestion: How did you engage with your weakness?

instructions.questions: Answer the questions below. Each 'yes' gives you one advancement mark to use.
instructions.selectMore: Click skills to select them for marking. You have marks remaining.
instructions.readyToMark: Click 'Mark Selected Skills' when ready to proceed.
instructions.readyToRoll: Click 'Roll All Advancement' to roll for all marked skills.
instructions.readyToRollIndividual: Click skills to roll them individually. When all are rolled, click Complete Session to finish.
instructions.allSkillsRolled: All skills rolled! Click Complete Session to finish and record results.
instructions.advancementRule: If the roll exceeds your current skill level, the skill is increased by one, up to a maximum of 18.
instructions.noMarksToUse: No advancement marks available. Click 'Next' to proceed to rolling.
instructions.noSkills: No skills available to mark. Answer the questions first to earn marks, or return to your character sheet to clear some existing marks.
instructions.noMarkedSkills: No skills are currently marked for advancement. Use the 'Select Skills' step to mark some, or mark them on your character sheet.

confirmComplete.title: Complete Session
confirmComplete.content: Finalize session advancement? This will record all rolls to the journal and close the dialog.

confirmCancel.title: Cancel Advancement
confirmCancel.content: This will revert all rolled skills and remove marks added this session. Are you sure?

removeWeakness.title: Remove Weakness
removeWeakness.content: You have overcome your weakness! Remove it from your character sheet? You must play a full session without a weakness, then you may choose a new one.

warnings.noMoreMarks: You have used all available advancement marks.
warnings.noSkillsSelected: Select at least one skill to mark.
warnings.noMarkedSkills: No skills are marked for advancement.

notifications.skillMaxed: {skill} has reached maximum level (18)! {actor} may choose a heroic ability.

journal.gaveInDescription: Character acted according to their weakness and gained an advancement mark.
journal.overcameDescription: Character acted against their weakness and gained two advancement marks.
journal.heroicDescription: The character has mastered skills to level 18 and may choose heroic abilities.

errors.socketlibRequired: Dragonbane Campaign Assistant requires the socketlib module to be installed and active.
